name: Lone Fungus - Demo
description:
This is the demo of the title 'Lone Fungus' that's currently in development by me, if you wish to support this project check out the Early Access version here: https://bastigames.itch.io/lone-fungus

If you have any questions or feedback feel free to contact me at https://twitter.com/BastiArtGames

Or join our discord: https://discord.gg/dgapCNF


Patch - 0.01938
- Added a sign at the beginning explaining basic gameplay mechanics.
- Changed some inventory graphics to make equipped items more clear.
- Added another Mindshroom at the beginning.
- Fixed an Inventory Bug.

Patch - 0.01937
- Hot fix when exiting the inventory while viewing descriptions causes your character to bug out.
- Changed how the Dash works a bit (Holding up when dashing will still Dash you forward, to avoid confusion about the controls)
